channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Immigration agency flexes authority to sharply expand detention without bond hearing
item.description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement is moving to detain far more people than before, tapping a legal authority to jail anyone who entered the country illegally.

item.title: Republicans press leaders of Georgetown, Berkeley and CUNY on antisemitism complaints
Pam Bondi dodges questions on Epstein and Bongino amid Justice Department turmoil
